description: Setup script for testing environment using Jest, including initializing MSW (Mock Service Worker) for handling API mocking during tests.

methods.name: beforeAll
methods.description: Initializes the server to listen for requests before tests run,

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Resets request handlers after each test to prevent state leakage between tests.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Shuts down the server after all tests have completed.
